input_text:
Job Title: Senior Account Manager - Western US

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Management, Sales

Description:
eTeam is a global recruiting firm servicing hundreds of large enterprise clients spread over 70 countries. We have tossed aside the traditional staffing model, and replaced it with a grander vision!
What's the Opportunity?
We’re looking to expand our Account Management team with a talented manager to drive business & revenue results in some of our key client accounts by producing a well-managed, profitable, and growing book of business opportunities. You will work remotely and visit existing clients within an assigned territory. Candidate must live in the Western US, background in IT staffing is ideal, 3+ years in the industry.
In this role, you will be client-facing & responsible for driving high-quality sales through deal shaping, negotiation, contract closure & execution of a key account/pursuit plan.
Successful candidates must thrive in a growing, fast-evolving, people-based culture and be passionate about identifying new client opportunities and growing the eTeam brand. We are looking for someone with the potential, creativity, energy, drive, organizational skills & positive attitude to work with the team to deliver innovative revenue-generating results around eTeam’s services and solution offerings.
Responsibilities:
Drive & execute revenue and sales Quota goals through effective management of account/pursuit plans, business development, internal collaboration strategies & account plan execution.Prospect, establish, lead, and grow relationships with key client personnel & teams (Principle, Director, VP & C-Level) within the client account, focused on engineering & IT solutions.Maintain regular communication (Update activity in Jobdiva) with the Sales Leader to keep him/her abreast of account progress & evolve the account execution plan.Target the right clients, grow a quality pipeline, win profitable deals, and manage sales activities with the objective of creating mutually beneficial, trust-based relationships that create value.Manage and close opportunities through the end-to-end sales cycle.Be responsible for the establishment of a win strategy, ongoing qualification, coordinating all required internal approvals, identification of required resources, management of the solution/proposition development, complex deal shaping, management of client interactions and facilitating the negotiations and closing activities.Recommend ideas and strategies that will contribute to the growth of eTeam.
Qualifications:
The ideal candidate will have:
3+ years of staffing sales and account management experienceStrong verbal and written communication skills; strong customer service and interpersonal skillsExcellent collaboration and team-building skillsOrganized and methodical; strong prioritization and negotiation skillsStrong process orientation coupled with an ability to work with virtual teamsPassionate about sales and technology; partners with clients to ensure growthExperienced in building relationships with Director & VP level business decision-makersExperienced and adept at consistently demonstrating strong people management skillsCreative and innovative; seen as forward-thinking in approach
BenefitsCompetitive salary and bonus planComprehensive medical, dental, and vision coverageRegular compensation reviews - great work is rewarded!Open vacation policy401k planFun events and team building
eTeam is proudly committed to recruiting and retaining a diverse and inclusive workforce. As an Equal Opportunity Employer, we never discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical condition), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Manage and close opportunities through the sales cycle

Establish a win strategy, ongoing qualification, coordinate internal approvals, identify resources, manage solution/proposition development, manage client interactions, facilitate negotiations, and closing activities
Recommend ideas and strategies for growth
